title: The last video store
description: Natalia works at the last video store in town.Her husband, Danny, has been promising a career in movie-making for the last nine years, but it's always 'next year or the year after.' Things seem bleak.Then one day, a man from out of town comes into the store and rents 'Jaws'. He talks to her, and not about the weather either.Things will never be the same again.Warning: contains sex, nudity and a lifeless marriage.
author: Marcella Chik
